text:
In the page

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/programs/configure.html

We have this:

--disable-access
Disable host-based access control provided by mod_access.

The link does not work. And it seems that Apache 2.2 does not have mod_access anymore.
creator: bichinhoverde@spwinternet.com.br
poirier@pobox.com
